tool.name: Cell types - build cell ontology map
tool.description: Create a mapping from labels to CL terms
tool.command:
mkdir -p input_dir; #for $sdrf in $input_sdrfs: cp '$sdrf' input_dir/; #end for
build_cell_ontology_dict.R --input-dir input_dir --output-dict-path "${output_dict_path}" --output-text-path "${output_txt_path}" #if $condensed_sdrf --condensed-sdrf "${condensed_sdrf}" #end if #if $barcode_col_name --barcode-col-name "${barcode_col_name}" #end if #if $cell_label_col_name --cell-label-col-name "${cell_label_col_name}" #end if #if $cell_ontology_col_name --cell-ontology-col-name "${cell_ontology_col_name}" #end if

param.name: condensed_sdrf
param.label: Condensed SDRF
param.help: Are the supplied SDRFs of condensed format?

param.name: barcode_col_name
param.label: Barcode column name
param.help: Name of the barcode field in provided SDRF files

param.name: cell_label_col_name
param.label: Cell label column name
param.help: Name of the cell label field name in provided SDRF files

param.name: cell_ontology_col_name
param.label: Cell ontology column name
param.help: Name of the cell ontology terms column in SDRF files (must be identical across all files)
